org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

类 PendingCheckpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.PendingCheckpoint

  • public class PendingCheckpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    A pending checkpoint is a checkpoint that has been started, but has not been acknowledged by all tasks that need to acknowledge it. Once all tasks have acknowledged it, it becomes a CompletedCheckpoint.

    Note that the pending checkpoint, as well as the successful checkpoint keep the state handles always as serialized values, never as actual values.

        public boolean canBeSubsumed()
        Checks whether this checkpoint can be subsumed or whether it should always continue, regardless of newer checkpoints in progress.
        返回:
        True if the checkpoint can be subsumed, false otherwise.

      • setCancellerHandle

        public boolean setCancellerHandle(java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> cancellerHandle)
        Sets the handle for the canceller to this pending checkpoint. This method fails with an exception if a handle has already been set.
        返回:
        true, if the handle was set, false, if the checkpoint is already disposed;

      • getCompletionFuture
